title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: The bug is related to accessibility problems. When I launch the Help view, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working. The tab key does not perform any action as expected.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything.
EB: When I launch the Help view, pressing the tab key should move the focus to the next interactive element.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Press the tab key and observe that it does not move the focus to the next interactive element.
